alert.note: Alert for Coastal Brunswick; Coastal New Hanover; Coastal Pender; Inland Brunswick; Inland New Hanover (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 13 at 12:58AM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of New Hanover, southeastern Pender and southeastern Brunswick Counties through 130 AM EST... At 1258 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near St. James, or near Oak Island, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wilmington, Leland, Oak Island, Carolina Beach, Wrightsville Beach, Kure Beach, Holden Beach, Caswell Beach, Bald Head Island, Snows Cut, South Masonboro Island, Ocean Crest Pier, Yaupon Beach, Figure Eight Island, North Masonboro Island, Hampstead, Boiling Spring Lakes, St. James, Southport and Topsail Beach. This includes US Route 17 in Brunswick County between mile markers 17 and 44. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Brunswick; Coastal New Hanover; Coastal Pender; Inland Brunswick; Inland New Hanover
